DOC.brief_summary: This pilot study conduct evaluate whether consumption diet soda sweeten sucralose acesulfame-potassium lead change gut microbiota . Following one week run-in period , healthy , young adult randomize consume either diet soda carbonate water ( control ) three time per day one week . Stool urine sample collect baseline , follow run-in , one-week intervention .
DOC.brief_title: Effects Non-nutritive Sweeteners Composition Gut Microbiome
DOC.criteria: Healthy adult age 1835 year Consume less 1 food/beverage nonnutritive sweetener per month Able willing consume diet soda three time daily 1 week Recent diet significant weight change Antibiotic use past 3 month Diarrhea past two week Use medication know affect metabolism weight Weight < 50 kg ( 110 lb . ) History metabolic complication include high blood sugar , elevate cholesterol , liver disease
